casebody.data:
[Cite as 02/28/2003 Case Announcements, 2003-Ohio-889.]

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS AND ADMINISTRATIVE ACTIONS

February 28, 2003

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2003-0111. Sisson v. Lawrence.

Board of Tax Appeals, No. 1999-L-1352. This cause is pending before the court as an appeal from the Board of Tax Appeals. Upon consideration of appellant’s request for extension of time to file merit brief,

IT IS ORDERED by the court that the request be, and hereby is, granted, and appellant’s merit brief is due on or before April 3, 2003.
